Item(by='DantesKite', descendants=132, kids=[24827477, 24828016, 24828893, 24829073, 24828948, 24829531, 24822642, 24827996, 24828399, 24830198, 24828177, 24827823, 24829765, 24830148, 24828099, 24830155, 24828139, 24828618, 24829683, 24829221, 24822638, 24829790, 24828437, 24828698, 24829129, 24829005, 24827657, 24829663, 24828999, 24827800, 24828389, 24828557, 24828586, 24828394, 24828685, 24828644, 24828170, 24829379, 24828198, 24828227, 24827816, 24829072, 24828111, 24827638, 24828097, 24827436, 24829269, 24829653, 24829470, 24829914, 24830361, 24829684, 24828458, 24829206, 24828897, 24822896, 24828435, 24829282], score=156, time=1603066282, title='Ask HN: How do you deal with chronic illness?', item_type='story', url=None, parent=None, text='I&#x27;ve been reading about people who have chronic conditions, some of which can be quite challenging. I&#x27;m currently going through something relatively minor myself.<p>But it got me wondering, for those living with a chronic illness (not necessarily terminal), how do you deal with the stress of it?')
